snippet: With President Obama having won a second term, lobbyists are readying a varied agenda to influence the makeup of crucial Congressional committees and regulatory agencies while working to avert the so-called fiscal cliff and temper the Dodd-Frank...
abstract: With President Obama having won a second term, lobbyists are readying a varied agenda to influence the makeup of crucial Congressional committees and regulatory agencies while working to avert the so-called fiscal cliff and temper the Dodd-Frank regulatory overhaul.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and JESSICA SILVER-GREENBERG

headline.main: With an Obama Victory, Wall Street Pivots to Plan B

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Securities Industry and Financial Markets Assn

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
